title: Last Batch of T206s HOFers For Sale – McGraw, Waddell, Duffy, Jennings, Willis & Clarke
author: Archive

posts.post_title: Last Batch of T206s HOFers For Sale – McGraw, Waddell, Duffy, Jennings, Willis & Clarke
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Adam
This is my last batch of T206s HOFers that I currently have available for sale (front and back scans provided below).  First come, first serve.  All prices include delivery.  Paypal fine, with no additional surcharge.  Please email me at aamoniz@yahoo.com if you would like any!  

T206 Vic Willis, throwing, PSA 2 - $70
T206 Rube Waddell, throwing, PSA 2 - $80
T206 John McGraw, finger in air, PSA 1 - $60 
T206 Hugh Duffy, PSA 2 - **SOLD, thanks Brian**
T206 Hughie Jennings, one hand showing, PSA 2 - **SOLD, thanks Brian**
T206 Fred Clarke, portrait, PSA 2 - **SOLD, thanks Mike**

In addition to being for sale, I would also consider trading any of the above for a T206 Ed Foster (please just email me a scan with a proposed trade).  Cash could always be added, including by me, to even a trade out.

Regards,
Adam
aamoniz@yahoo.com
